participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: kind-hearted and compassionate, enjoys helping others and has a strong connection with animals.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and reflective, often contemplates his life experiences and strives for a better future.
participant_2.background: i'm a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm. i now live in the city. i'm a 45 year old male. i take many medications and some of them make me see things.

content.text: I like it when it is cold outside.
I do. I volunteer at the animal shelter.
What is your all time favorite color?
Mine is blue. What is yours?
